nl.tno.sensorstorm.api.processing

Interface SingleParticleOperation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Operation, Serializable

    public interface SingleParticleOperation
extends Operation
    A SingleParticleOperation performs the processing of particles in a channel, each particle will be presented to this operation one by one. The ChannelBolt manages the operations, each channel will have its own operation instance. An operation is created at soon as the ChannelBolt gets a particle with an unknown channelid.
    Author:
    waaijbdvd

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<? extends DataParticle> execute(DataParticle inputParticle)
      A new particle has arrived for this operation.

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.tno.sensorstorm.api.processing.Operation

        init

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        List<? extends DataParticle> execute(DataParticle inputParticle)
                                     throws OperationException
        A new particle has arrived for this operation. A list containing zero or more particles can be returned to be sent further up into the topology.
        Parameters:
        inputParticle - The dataParticle that need to be processed.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of zero or more data particles to be sent further up to the topology.
        Throws:
        OperationException
